Class.Name: ExtractProperty
Class.Description: Extracts property values from connected input

In.Name: In
In.Description: When signaled assigns property values using the supplied source input

Out.Name: Out
Out.Description: Signaled after all property haves have been pushed to the output slots

DynamicDataSlot.Name: Source
DynamicDataSlot.Description: The value on which to extract properties from.
